name: Beach Weird
description: The Beach Weird is a large elemental creature embodying the essence of coastal environments, capable of traversing sandy shores and tide pools. It features a powerful physique with notable defensive capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to create hazardous quicksand and become invisible in water makes it a unique guardian of its coastal territory.
goals: To protect tide pools and sandy shores from intruders.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures, especially those of water or earth.
environment: Coastal areas, particularly around tide pools and sandy shores.
strengths: Powerful slam attack and the ability to create hazardous quicksand.
weaknesses: Bound to its tide pools, limiting its movement range.
attacks: Slam attack deals significant bludgeoning damage and can push targets away.
most_powerful_ability: Create Quicksand, allowing it to control the battlefield and trap intruders.
senses: Blindsight 30 feet allows it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Possesses a perception skill of average effectiveness, with a +2 bonus.
additional_information: Elemental nature grants it resilience to environmental factors.
Can become invisible when fully immersed in water.
Burrows through sand but cannot attack while doing so.
Perishes if moved beyond 100 feet from its tide pool.
Gains various damage immunities and resistances.
